remarks: The scalar injection is a function into the polynomial algebra. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mplasclf.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mplasclf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
mplasclf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
mplasclf.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
mplasclf.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
mplasclf.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mplasclf $p |- ( ph -> A : K --> B ) $.
